amendment.description: Amendment sought to require appropriate Federal departments and agencies, as identified by the President, to propose voluntary, regulatory, and other actions sufficient to reduce demand for oil in the United States by at least 1.0 million barrels per day from the projected demand for oil in 2013.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 109-49 to require the Administration to take "voluntary, regulatory, and other actions" to reduce oil demand in the U.S. by 1 million barrels per day from projected levels by 2013.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 262 (Roll no. 117).
